item.title: Phantom Beasts
item.description: Unleash your phantom beasts and shoot your way through a postapocalyptic quarantine zone in this deadly, heart-stopping side-scrolling shooter in 2.5D. Destroy your enemies with your guns and phantom beasts, learn new powerful skills and unleash the Rage beast within you to stomp everything down PLATFORM PC ROLE Lead Developer GENRE Shooter, Action, 2.5D STATUS In Development - You can see the game on Steam PUBLISHER full Indie :D https://www.phantombeasts.studio/
